sections.installation:
Download, Upgrading, Installation:

Upgrade

  1. First deactivate Twitter Follow Button
  2. Remove the twitter-follow-button directory

Install

  1. Unzip the twitter-follow-button.zip file.
  2. Upload the the twitter-follow-button folder (not just the files in it!) to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the Twitter Follow Button and a subpage for it (Twitter Follow Button) will appear in your Options menu.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.

Advanced Users

For advanced use of the plugin, see the Twitter Follow Button page on Andrea
